review_data.title: Kleine Lunch mit Freunden / quick lunch with friends
review_data.content: Nice Thai take away with some seats available. The family hosting you is very friendly and the food, Thai soups and Thai curries, is simply delicious. Very casual atmosphere. Will definitely come back more often here.

review_data.title: Nice friendly restaurant for good Thai food
review_data.content: Horm-Djan is located just around the corner from the Schwamendingenplatz. The staff was very friendly during my visit. There are around 15 tables inside in addition to the approximate eight or so sidewalk tables. The food selections consist of a seafood, chicken, beef, and veggies...More

review_data.title: Really excellent authentic Thai food
